fixes.name: Gross Utilization % (Quality)
fixes.dax_expression: ABS(SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)]) / MAX('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Limit (Quality) ]))
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau aggregate expression to DAX: ABS maps to ABS, SUM(...) and MAX(...) kept as aggregations. All column references were transformed to the 'TableName'[ColumnName] format using the calculation's table name.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The formula contains aggregate functions (SUM and MAX), so it must be implemented as a measure.
